description:

Location: Armada House, Telephone Avenue, Bristol BS1 4BQ

AGENDA

**18.00 – 18:30 Meet & Greet**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**18:30 - 19:15 Kubernetes** by **[Andrew Pruski](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrewpruski/)**

Details coming soon.

**20:30 - Pub**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**About Armada House - [https://armadahousebristol.com/](https://armadahousebristol.com)**

Armada House is a versatile venue in the heart of City. Recently refurbished to showcase its gorgeous original features alongside every modern comfort you might need, Armada House is the ideal venue for any event. From corporate events, to private parties, to beautiful weddings, Armada House is your ideal choice among event venues in Bristol
The building is steeped in history, boasting two 17th century fireplaces, and a remarkable past as the site where Her Late Majesty Queen Elizabeth II made the very first non-operator telephone call in the UK.

**\-\-\-\-**
**Photos**
*We ask that you do NOT take photos at this meetup.*

We will invite people to be included in a group photo/s during the event. Speakers will let you know if it's okay to photograph their presentation (excluding other attendees).

You may see organisers taking photos during the talks. These will be of speakers, if they have agreed to this, and will not include faces of attendees.
title: Kubernetes and Databricks
